Eastereggs.Quest_for_Glory: If either Slayer or Challenger kills one another, they will be granted a permanent sharpness level on their weapon.
Eastereggs.Flames_of_the_Ancient: If either Phoenix or Dragon kills one another, they will be granted a permanent 5% additional ratio on their passive.
Eastereggs.Song_of_the_Sea: If either Fisherman or Pirate kills one another, they will be granted 10 gold.
